title: Pop-Culture Palettes We Love
description: Harry Potter, the Powerpuff Girls, Care Bears...why not have as much fun as possible with your makeup?
excerpt: Shop SHEGLAM's makeup collection palettes featuring characters like Harry Potter, The Powerpuff Girls, Care Bears, Willy Wonka, Harley Quinn, and more
text: 1The Powerpuff Girls x SHEGLAM Collection SetThere’s saving the day, and then there’s saving the day and looking real good doing it. The most adorable crime-fighting trio is individually repped within this kit: There are three shimmer sticks, lip glosses, and palettes (one of each inspired by each ass-kicking, knee-sock-wearing Powerpuff Girl), plus a moisturizing lip balm and a shimmer blush. That last one, sweetly encased in a pink tin, features a range of rosy shades that will give you the ultimate do-gooder glow. 2Harley Quinn x SHEGLAM Collection SetIf this is your makeup muse, we’ve got great news: It’s easy to inject some of her punk-princess vibes into your day-to-day with this multi-piece set. There are blush sticks and tinted lip balms, plus tattoos and an undereye mask (because, obviously). But the standout score might be the pink and blue hair powders that you can drag down your locks for a jolt of color. Three color-changing lipsticks will also give you serious vamp-cred. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below3Harry Potter x SHEGLAM Full Collection SetWhy pick one house when you can belong to all of them? This magical collection includes shadow quads for each of the wizarding houses and four high-shine lip glosses that would pass as true-blue potions (with names inspired by mixtures brewed up in the movies). But Hufflepuff or Slytherin, the one commonality in the beauty world is needing a great pair of lips. A potted lip mask the color of deep crushed berries, encased in a mini magic cauldron, is a luxe treat that good and bad witches alike will appreciate. 4Care Bears x SHEGLAM Collection SetThe cuddliest collection from SHEGLAM’s latest, though, has to be this sweet Care Bears set. With plush fuzz aplenty (encasing an eyeliner palette and a trio of blushes), it’s seriously cute. The included shades are inspired by a rainbow’s worth of bears, making it easy to go ultra-playful with your look. From lime green liner to lilac and tangerine shadows, it’s a maximialist’s dream. Our favorite inclusions of all might just be the extras, though. How sweet is that fluffy Care Bears vanity mirror? Or the little bear pouch to tuck in your gloss and keep in your purse? Care Bear stare, indeed!Advertisement - Continue Reading Below5Rick and Morty x SHEGLAM Full Collection SetFor a shrieking good time, this Rick and Morty-inspired set is your thing, with a range of eye-shadow and lip-gloss hues, plus a setting powder to make sure your look lasts all day. The characters really come alive courtesy of a grimacing makeup sponge and hilariously shocked setting spray. And beyond the proper product, there's a faux-scanner hand mirror and a headpiece to finish off your most fantastic look.
html:
1

The Powerpuff Girls x SHEGLAM Collection Set

There’s saving the day, and then there’s saving the day and looking real good doing it. The most adorable crime-fighting trio is individually repped within this kit: There are three shimmer sticks, lip glosses, and palettes (one of each inspired by each ass-kicking, knee-sock-wearing Powerpuff Girl), plus a moisturizing lip balm and a shimmer blush. That last one, sweetly encased in a pink tin, features a range of rosy shades that will give you the ultimate do-gooder glow.

2

Harley Quinn x SHEGLAM Collection Set

If this is your makeup muse, we’ve got great news: It’s easy to inject some of her punk-princess vibes into your day-to-day with this multi-piece set.

There are blush sticks and tinted lip balms, plus tattoos and an undereye mask (because, obviously). But the standout score might be the pink and blue hair powders that you can drag down your locks for a jolt of color. Three color-changing lipsticks will also give you serious vamp-cred.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

3

Harry Potter x SHEGLAM Full Collection Set

Why pick one house when you can belong to all of them? This magical collection includes shadow quads for each of the wizarding houses and four high-shine lip glosses that would pass as true-blue potions (with names inspired by mixtures brewed up in the movies).

But Hufflepuff or Slytherin, the one commonality in the beauty world is needing a great pair of lips. A potted lip mask the color of deep crushed berries, encased in a mini magic cauldron, is a luxe treat that good and bad witches alike will appreciate.

4

Care Bears x SHEGLAM Collection Set

The cuddliest collection from SHEGLAM’s latest, though, has to be this sweet Care Bears set. With plush fuzz aplenty (encasing an eyeliner palette and a trio of blushes), it’s seriously cute. The included shades are inspired by a rainbow’s worth of bears, making it easy to go ultra-playful with your look. From lime green liner to lilac and tangerine shadows, it’s a maximialist’s dream.

Our favorite inclusions of all might just be the extras, though. How sweet is that fluffy Care Bears vanity mirror? Or the little bear pouch to tuck in your gloss and keep in your purse? Care Bear stare, indeed!

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

5

Rick and Morty x SHEGLAM Full Collection Set

For a shrieking good time, this Rick and Morty-inspired set is your thing, with a range of eye-shadow and lip-gloss hues, plus a setting powder to make sure your look lasts all day.

The characters really come alive courtesy of a grimacing makeup sponge and hilariously shocked setting spray. And beyond the proper product, there's a faux-scanner hand mirror and a headpiece to finish off your most fantastic look.
